description: This construct was made using the CHORI-17: Hydatidiform Mole (Homo sapiens) BAC Library and contains a Localization and Affinity Purification (LAP) tag at the C-terminal of the protein of interest. The last 50 bases before the stop codon of the tagged-protein are as follows: AGCCCATGCATGGCAGCTTAGCCGGAGTTAAACTGAGCAGCCAACAGGCC
MCF7 cells (ATCC # HTB­22) stably transfected with a plasmid containing human E2F1 fused at the N-­terminus to an HA tag and the estrogen receptor ligand binding domain.
tags:object:array: name: HA, location: N-terminal; name: ER, location: N-terminal
